goal.ch: This course is aimed at introducing how to develop linguistic observations into workable linguistic research ideas and proposals. Each week we will discuss one popular linguistic topic. Through discussing assigned readings, students will learn to the significances of these linguistic findings and theories, locate references with keywords, narrow the observations into research questions and design a method that can answer research questions. By the end of the term, students are expected to work in groups or pairs to present a research proposal with solid support from known studies.

Week 10Multimodality

Week 15Studies of linguistics in Taiwan
